sentences.en: A convenient classification of stars is based upon the observed sequence of spectral types.
sentences.cn: 一种实用的恒星分类法是基于测得的光谱类型序列.

sentences.en: At times he seems rather ordinary. At other times ethereal, perhaps even spectral.
sentences.cn: 有时好像很普通,有时又虚无缥缈, 甚至像个幽灵.

sentences.en: Colour filters are not very effective in isolating narrow spectral bands.
sentences.cn: 一些滤色片不能很有效地分离狭窄的光谱带.

sentences.en: Cytochromes can be detected by their spectral characteristics.
sentences.cn: 细胞色素可通过其光谱特性检测.

sentences.en: Exposure ratios between spectral bands are determined from in situ reflectance spectra of objects in scene.
sentences.cn: 光谱波段之间的曝光量比值,可以根据景物中目标的就地测定的反射光谱确定.

sentences.en: Here he inaugurated the spectral theory of bilinear symmetric forms.
sentences.cn: 在这里他开创了双线性对称形式的光谱理论.

sentences.en: Natural spectral peaks of the vocal tract that aid in the recognition of speech sounds.
sentences.cn: 声道的自然频谱峰值,帮助语音识别.

sentences.en: She is compelling, spectral, fascinating, an unforgettably unique performer.
sentences.cn: 她极具吸引力，清幽如鬼魅，令人着迷，令人难忘，是个独具特色的演员。

sentences.en: Surface temperature and spectral measurements at Santiaguito lava dome, Guatemala.
sentences.cn: 在危地马拉Santiaguito熔岩圆盖地面温度和光谱测量.

sentences.en: The origins of stars of differing spectral types must be dissimilar.
sentences.cn: 不同光谱型星的起源必然是不一样的.

sentences.en: The spectral distribution of a black body radiation is described by Planck's.
sentences.cn: 黑体辐射的光谱分配由普朗克定律描述.

sentences.en: The spectral sensitivity of various cells is very different.
sentences.cn: 各种光电管的分光灵敏度是很不相同的.

sentences.en: The visible is the most well - defined spectral region.
sentences.cn: 可见光是含意最明确的光谱波段.

sentences.en: This effect is particularly important for LEDS since the emitted spectral width is several hundred angstroms.
sentences.cn: 这种效应对于发光二极管来说是特别重要的,因为发光二极管所发射的光谱带宽可达几百埃.

sentences.en: Total radiation instruments employ some broad spectral band sensors.
sentences.cn: 全辐射仪器要使用某些宽频带传感器.

trans.tran_en: relating to or like a spectre
